structure.unit: SANITARIANS, WATER PLANT OPERATORS, AND WATER WELL CONSTRUCTION PRACTICES

law.catch_line: Plants to be classified according to skills required for operation.
law.text: The Energy and Environment Cabinet shall classify all water treatment plants and water distribution systems with due regard to size, type, physical conditions affecting such treatment plants and distribution systems, and according to the skill, knowledge and experience that the operator must have to supervise successfully the operation of such water treatment plants and water distribution systems so as to protect the public health.
law.history: Amended 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 24, sec. 338, effective July 15, 2010. -- Amended 1976 Ky. Acts ch. 299, sec. 46. -- Amended 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 74, Art. VI, sec. 107(1) and (11). -- Amended 1972 (1st Extra. Sess.) Ky. Acts ch. 3, sec. 39. -- Created 1966 Ky. Acts ch. 156, sec. 3.
